question: Which institution has the Supreme Court appointed to prepare a plan for improving Delhi's green cover?

At which port did India's Matsya-6000 submersible successfully complete its wet tests, moving closer to the 500m shallow-water trials by 2025 as part of the Samudrayan Project under the Deep Ocean Mission?
What is the theme of the first-ever Regional Dialogue on the Global Coalition for Social Justice, scheduled for February 24-25, 2025, in New Delhi?
Where was India's first vertical bifacial solar plant inaugurated by the Union Minister for Housing and Urban Affairs and Power Manohar Lal?
Which scheme has been extended to 2025-26 with the provision of 100% pulse procurement for the next four years?
Which ministry is organizing the Aadi Mahotsav 2025, from February 16 to 24, 2025, at Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium, New Delhi?
options: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment

question: Which organizations launched the 'AI for Entrepreneurship' initiative to train 1 lakh youth?
options: AICTE, Ministry of Education, and Google
NITI Aayog, ISRO, and Intel India
Ministry of Electronics and IT, IBM, and NSDC

question: What is the maximum health insurance coverage provided under the Ayushman Bharat Vay Vandana Scheme for senior citizens?
Which organization launched the J. C. Bose Grant (JBG) to support senior Indian scientists and engineers in advancing research?
What is the full form of the NAKSHA program that aims to create and update land records in urban areas?
options: National Agricultural Knowledge-based Survey of Habitations
National Automated Knowledge Survey for Housing Applications
National Aerial Knowledge-based Survey for Housing Authorities
National Geospatial Knowledge-based Land Survey of Urban Habitations
answer: National Geospatial Knowledge-based Land Survey of Urban Habitations

question:
Union Government released XV Finance Commission Grants for Rural Local Bodies (RLBs) of Bihar, Haryana, and Sikkim for FY 2024-25. Find how many of them are rightly matched?
1. Bihar - ₹869.74 crore
2. Haryana - ₹210.07 crore
3. Sikkim - ₹6.26 crore
Which power station won the 1st prize for official language implementation at the Regional Official Language Conference in Jaipur?
The Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC) initiative was incorporated as a non-profit, Section-8 company and incubated at the ______.
What is the key objective of the Aircraft Leasing Bill approved by the Indian government in 2024?
options: To introduce new airlines in India, thereby making the airline market more competitive
To build new aircraft manufacturing facilities in India via international collaboration
To increase regressive tax benefits for airline operators.
To reduce airfares by lowering leasing and financing costs for airlines.
answer: To reduce airfares by lowering leasing and financing costs for airlines.

question: Who will be the Chief Guest at India's 76th Republic Day celebrations in 2025?
The newly inaugurated Sonamarg Tunnel by PM Modi ensures all-weather road connectivity between which two locations in Jammu and Kashmir?
Who launched Phase 4 of the National Educational Alliance for Technology (NEAT 4.0) in January 2025?
options: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)

question: At which forum did Piyush Goyal launch the 'Bharat Cleantech Manufacturing Platform,' aimed at boosting solar, wind, hydrogen, and battery sectors, and positioning India as a global leader in clean energy manufacturing?
Which report stated that India's poverty rate fell below 5% in 2024, with rural poverty at 4.86% and urban poverty at 4.09%?
Under which scheme has the Rural Development Ministry approved 56 watershed development projects worth ₹700 crore, covering approximately 2.8 lakh hectares across 10 states?
Where was the foundation stone for the new Central Ayurveda Research Institute building laid by PM Modi?
Where was the closing event of the "Hamara Samvidhan Hamara Swabhiman" campaign organized?
In September 2024, India surpassed which milestone in renewable energy capacity?
Which app was launched by Union Minister Jyotiraditya Scindia to enhance telecom security and accessibility for citizens?

What is the name of the Indian Army's Motorcycle Rider Display Team that set a new world record with a 20.4-foot-high human pyramid comprising 40 men on 7 motorcycles, traveling 2 kilometers along Kartavya Path?
Which edition of National Voters' Day was observed on January 25?
What is the name of the newly launched platform for managing business and organizational documents?
